import { MoreVert, ThumbUp } from '@mui/icons-material' import React from 'react' import { Users } from '../dummyData' function Post(post) { console.log(Users.id) return (
{Users.map(user => {if(user.id===post.post.userId) {return }})} {Users.map(user => {if(user.id===post.post.userId) { return user.username } } )} {post.post.date}
{post.post.desc}
{post.post.like} people like it.
{ post.post.comment === 1 || post.post.comment === 0 ? {post.post.comment} comment : {post.post.comment} comments }
) } export default Post
